The datasets can be read into `R` from `"https://cgmoreh.github.io/SSC7001M/data/FILE_NAME"` using an appropriate command from the `haven` package or other importing function. ::: {.cell} ::: ::: osterman Replication_data_ESS1-9_20201113 .dta NA Replication data for @Osterman2021CanWeTrustEducationFostering, based on European Social Survey Rounds 1-9 data [Source](https://dataverse.harvard.edu/dataset.xhtml?persistentId=doi:10.7910/DVN/RCSCDA)
